hed: The World Through the Eyes of the US
dek: The countries Americans were talking about most since 1900.

prelude.value: Before social media, before nightly TV news, before radio, there was the newspaper. This drove (and to a large extent still drives) our day-to-day conversations about what is going on the world. The front page of the internet of the newspaper was the front page. Thanks to the New York Times archive, much of that content is still preserved. I looked at 724,513 front page headlines since 1900 to find out what countries around world dominated our attention month after month.
